languages.text: При каждом попадании по владельцу оружием ближнего боя, происходит взрыв, который отбрасывает атакующего на 1 клеткe назад и наносит урон от 12 до 18 ед огненного урона

traits.locale_text: При каждом попадании по владельцу оружием ближнего боя, происходит взрыв, который отбрасывает атакующего на 1 клеткe назад и наносит урон от 12 до 18 ед огненного урона

languages.text: Whenever an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the captain with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, the captain spends 1 stack of fire barrier causing an explosion that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} adjacent enemies 1 cell away and deals <u>(from 12 to 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} completely ignoring {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда враг совершает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} по капитану оружием {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнего боя{/g}, капитан теряет 1 уровень огненного барьера. Это сопровождается взрывом, который {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}отталкивает{/g} врагов на соседних клетках на 1 клетку и наносит им <u>(от 12 до 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненного урона{/g}, полностью игнорируя {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever an enemy hits the captain with a melee weapon, the captain spends 1 stack of fire barrier causing the explosion that pushes adjacent enemies 1 cell away and deals them <u>(from 12 to 18)</u> fire damage that ignores armour.

Whenever an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the captain with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, the captain spends 1 stack of fire barrier causing an explosion that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} adjacent enemies 1 cell away and deals <u>(from 12 to 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} completely ignoring {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

Whenever an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the captain with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, the captain spends 1 stack of fire barrier causing an explosion that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} adjacent enemies 1 cell away and deals <u>(from 12 to 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} completely ignoring {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

languages.text: Bir düşman, kaptana {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} silahı ile {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğunda{/g} kaptan, 1 birikim ateş bariyeri harcayarak bir patlamaya sebep olur. Bu patlama, bitişikteki düşmanları 1 hücre uzağa {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}iter{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} değerlerini tamamen yok sayarak <u>(12 ila 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}ateş hasarı{/g} verir.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the captain with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, the captain spends 1 stack of fire barrier causing an explosion that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} adjacent enemies 1 cell away and deals <u>(from 12 to 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} completely ignoring {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Bir düşman, kaptana {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} silahı ile {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğunda{/g} kaptan, 1 birikim ateş bariyeri harcayarak bir patlamaya sebep olur. Bu patlama, bitişikteki düşmanları 1 hücre uzağa {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}iter{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} değerlerini tamamen yok sayarak <u>(12 ila 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}ateş hasarı{/g} verir.

languages.text: Cada vez que un enemigo {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} al capitán con un arma {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, el capitán gasta 1 acumulación de barrera de fuego para provocar una explosión que {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}empuja{/g} a los enemigos adyacentes a 1 casilla de distancia e inflige <u>(de 12 a 18)</u> puntos de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g} que ignoran por completo la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the captain with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, the captain spends 1 stack of fire barrier causing an explosion that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} adjacent enemies 1 cell away and deals <u>(from 12 to 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} completely ignoring {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que un enemigo {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} al capitán con un arma {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, el capitán gasta 1 acumulación de barrera de fuego para provocar una explosión que {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}empuja{/g} a los enemigos adyacentes a 1 casilla de distancia e inflige <u>(de 12 a 18)</u> puntos de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g} que ignoran por completo la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}.

languages.text: 每当敌人使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}萨戈纳舰长时，萨戈纳舰长会消耗1层“烈焰屏障”层数触发剧烈爆炸，将所有邻近敌人{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}推开{/g}1格，对其造成<u>12-18</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}，此次火焰伤害无视目标{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the captain with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, the captain spends 1 stack of fire barrier causing an explosion that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} adjacent enemies 1 cell away and deals <u>(from 12 to 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} completely ignoring {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当敌人使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}萨戈纳舰长时，萨戈纳舰长会消耗1层“烈焰屏障”层数触发剧烈爆炸，将所有邻近敌人{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}推开{/g}1格，对其造成<u>12-18</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}，此次火焰伤害无视目标{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}。

languages.text: Chaque fois que le capitaine est {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touché{/g} par l'arme de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} d'un ennemi, il dépense 1 cumul de Barrière de feu pour déclencher une explosion qui {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}repousse{/g} les ennemis adjacents de 1 case et inflige <u>de 12 à 18</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} ignorant totalement l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armure{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the captain with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, the captain spends 1 stack of fire barrier causing an explosion that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} adjacent enemies 1 cell away and deals <u>(from 12 to 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} completely ignoring {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le capitaine est {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touché{/g} par l'arme de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} d'un ennemi, il dépense 1 cumul de Barrière de feu pour déclencher une explosion qui {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}repousse{/g} les ennemis adjacents de 1 case et inflige <u>de 12 à 18</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} ignorant totalement l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armure{/g}.

languages.text: 敵が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器でキャプテンに{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}すると、キャプテンは1スタックの炎のバリアを消費し、爆発を引き起こす。隣接する敵を1セル{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}突き飛ばし{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を完全に無視する<u>（12～18）</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the captain with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, the captain spends 1 stack of fire barrier causing an explosion that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} adjacent enemies 1 cell away and deals <u>(from 12 to 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} completely ignoring {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 敵が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器でキャプテンに{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}すると、キャプテンは1スタックの炎のバリアを消費し、爆発を引き起こす。隣接する敵を1セル{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}突き飛ばし{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を完全に無視する<u>（12～18）</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g}を与える。

languages.text: Wenn ein Gegner den Kapitän mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfwaffe{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, verursacht der Kapitän mit 1 Stapel "Feuerbarriere" eine Explosion, die Gegner auf angrenzenden Feldern 1 Feld {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}zurückstößt{/g} und <u>(12 bis 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} verursacht, der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} ignoriert.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the captain with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon, the captain spends 1 stack of fire barrier causing an explosion that {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} adjacent enemies 1 cell away and deals <u>(from 12 to 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} completely ignoring {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn ein Gegner den Kapitän mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}waffe {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, verursacht der Kapitän mit 1 Stapel "Feuerbarriere" eine Explosion, die Gegner auf angrenzenden Feldern 1 Feld {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}zurückstößt{/g} und <u>(12 bis 18)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} verursacht, der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} ignoriert.
